sentences.en: Another driver managed to get the registration number of the car.
sentences.cn: 另一名司机看清了该车的车牌号。

sentences.en: Brindley was known as a very, very fast driver.
sentences.cn: 众所周知，布林德利是个喜欢飞车的人。

sentences.en: Do you think you’re a good driver?
sentences.cn: 你认为自己是个好司机吗？

sentences.en: He could not see the driver as the car nosed forward.
sentences.cn: 车慢慢向前开，他却看不见司机。

sentences.en: He sent his driver to fetch him a strawberry shake.
sentences.cn: 他让司机去给他买一杯草莓奶昔。

sentences.en: He started his working life as a truck driver.
sentences.cn: 他的工作生涯是从当卡车司机开始的。

sentences.en: I asked the driver to put his foot down for Nagchukha.
sentences.cn: 我要求司机加大油门去那曲。

sentences.en: Mr Honda was himself a keen racing driver in his younger days.
sentences.cn: 本田先生自己年轻时就是位热衷赛车的车手。

sentences.en: The British driver was unable to hang on to his lead.
sentences.cn: 英国车手没能保住自己的领先地位。

sentences.en: The driver failed to negotiate a bend and ran into a tree.
sentences.cn: 司机没能顺利拐弯，撞到了树上。

sentences.en: The driver got out of his van.
The driver managed to escape from the vehicle and shout a warning.
sentences.cn: 那名司机设法从车里逃了出来并大声警告别人。

sentences.en: The driver was a trim young woman of perhaps thirty.
sentences.cn: 司机是个大约30岁的身材苗条的年轻女子。

sentences.en: The farm employed a tractor driver and two general labourers.
sentences.cn: 农场雇用了一名拖拉机手和两名杂工。

sentences.en: The lorry driver escaped unhurt, but a pedestrian was injured.
sentences.cn: 卡车司机安然脱险，但有一位行人受了伤。

sentences.en: The team would have need of a driver of his worth.
sentences.cn: 这支队伍需要一位他这样技术水平的司机。

sentences.en: They drew a blank in their search for the driver.
sentences.cn: 他们四处寻找那个司机，但一无所获。

words.tran_cn: 强劲的；推进的；精力旺盛的
驱动器；驾车；[心理] 内驱力，推进力；快车道
畜群；牛群、羊群等；移动的人群或大批的东西
把家畜赶到市集的人；家畜商人；牲畜贩子
推动，发动（机器等）；驾驶（马车，汽车等）；驱赶

phrases.tran_cn: 成本动因；作业成本发生因素（作业成本动因）
驱动晶片；驱动器集成电路；显示面板用驱动
处于控制地位，掌握控制权
汽车司机；马达驱动器；电动驱动器
权力欲；机动打桩机；功率激励器
监督奴隶工作者；苛刻的上司
测试驱动程序；试车驾驶员

trans.tran_cn: 司机，驾驶员，驱动程序，驱动因素
trans.tran_en: someone who drives a car, bus etc
someone who drives a car, bus etc
